response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business operations. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, I estimate its true worth to be around $1,200,000. However, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $1,150,000, reflecting my desire to see this valuable asset utilized by someone who appreciates its full potential.

Please consider this offer carefully, knowing that it represents a significant saving compared to the market value. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together and contributing to the growth of your business.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1150000}
